Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory306.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Judging from the coordinates, we're still some distance from the sources of the red and blue mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Based on our current situation, there is no evidence of a path between the sources of the two factions.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So... we need to split up?', 3: '6'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'That seems to be the only reasonable course of action.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'So after a brief discussion, you split up into two teams: you with Lee, Lucia with Liv.'}
{3: 'This guarantees both teams have protective and investigative capabilities.'}
{3: 'After changing your comms to mid-ranged communication, the two teams of you head your separate ways.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory302.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia, the commandant and I have arrived at the vantage point.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Copy that. I'm setting up monitoring equipment here. We'll be in position shortly!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Looks like you're almost ready.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Seems like I can count on the both of you after all.', 3: '21'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...? Isn't that obvious?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Speaking of which, I've been meaning to ask you something.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant, what are your thoughts on Constructs?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...You know what, it's not like I have anything to hide anyways.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Before I was transferred to Babylonia, I was a member of Kurono.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Unlike the Task Force, I wasn't exactly fond of that place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I was just curious to hear your perspectives, so I could confirm whether or not I made the right choice.', 4: '1'}
{2: '...', 3: '33', 4: 'They are valuable companions.', 5: '34'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I'll take your word for it... for now. I just hope that you're true to your word.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Anyways, let's get back to the mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lee adeptly sets up the monitoring equipment and begins to establish a holographic scan of the target area.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'There appears to be a residential street from the Golden Age on one end and a large freestanding building on the other.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory304.png'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Commandant... are you familiar with this type of building?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Is it a church?', 3: '43', 4: 'Is it an assembly hall?', 5: '45', 6: "Oh, I know! It's an arcade!", 7: '47'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Looks similar, but we won't know until we take a closer look.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But that's en route for Lucia's team. Let's wait for a progress update.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Based on the building's location and interior... You might be right.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "But that's en route for Lucia's team. Let's wait for them to report back.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's that look for?", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Commandant, are you joking?', 4: '1'}
{2: '...Am I not allowed to?'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...If that's going to put your mind at ease, then go right ahead.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I wanna know what the building is used for, but that's en route for Lucia's team. Let's wait for them to report back.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've detected a large cluster of signals coming from the residential street. I'll transfer the image to your terminal.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory306.png'}
{3: 'After pressing a few buttons, the hologram appears on the terminal in your hand.'}
{3: 'You see a large group of red mechanoids on the residential street.'}
{3: 'On the far side of the block, mechanoids are coming from various places.'}
{3: 'In the center of all the red mechanoids, you see a peculiar mechanoid stand out among the crowd.'}
{3: '—Even though it bears some resemblance to the others, the rest of the red mechanoids seem to be keeping their distance.'}
{2: 'The mechanoid in the center...', 3: '68'}
{2: "What's so different about it?", 3: '69'}
{3: 'Glancing at the hologram, he quickly identifies the mechanoid in question and notices other peculiarities.'}
{3: 'He adjusts the surveillance equipment, causing the hologram to alter slightly.'}
{3: '—Numerous thin red lines extend from the middle mechanoid, connecting to some larger mechanoids nearby.'}
{3: 'From these larger mechanoids, additional thin red lines connect to the surrounding smaller mechanoids.'}
{2: 'What are those?', 3: '4670'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "I've extracted the data flow between the mechanoids and displayed it on the hologram.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'A web?', 3: '78', 4: 'The mechanoids... are interconnected?', 5: '81', 6: 'Is it... a binary tree?', 7: '83'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Looks like it, but that isn't the case.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The data flow between the mechanoids shows that there is a chain of command between them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The parent node originates from that mechanoid you pointed out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The data flow between the mechanoids shows that there is a chain of command between them.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'The parent node originates from that mechanoid you pointed out.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "...I don't think that's an appropriate metaphor, but there's no time to explain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'But yes, you can think of it as a binary tree with the central mechanoid controlling all the other mechanoids layer-by-layer.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'In short, the central mechanoid is the lifeblood of the red mechanoids.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'If we can destroy it or find an opportunity to analyze it, we should be able to uncover their plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Sounds reasonable. Let's do it.", 3: '88'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Prepare to move out. Follow me, Commandant. I'll try my best to keep you safe.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Understood.', 3: '90'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Lucia, did you get that?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: '...Lucia? Do you copy?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Yeah, we got it. What is it?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Lucia, we're moving out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Copy. We'll get going, too.", 4: '2'}
